abstract: San Francisco’s police chief Greg Suhr says he has moved to dismiss seven officers who sent or received text messages that spoke of lynching African-Americans and burning crosses.
lead_paragraph: San Francisco’s police chief said Friday that he had moved to dismiss seven officers who sent or received text messages that spoke of lynching African-Americans and burning crosses.

headline.main: San Francisco Police Officers to Be Dismissed Over Racist Texts
headline.print_headline: Officers to Be Dismissed Over Racist Texts

snippet: San Francisco’s police chief said Friday that he had moved to dismiss seven officers who sent or received text messages that spoke of lynching African-Americans and burning crosses.
